46003.label: I saw that ending from miles away.
46003.message: I saw that ending from miles away.

46009.name: templar_assassin_6
46009.label: The only mystery...
46009.message: The only mystery is how you lasted so long.

47008.name: viper_5
47008.label: Who needs legs, when...
47008.message: Who needs legs, when you got wings?

48001.name: luna_laugh
48001.label: Laugh
48001.message: Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha!

48004.name: luna_1
48004.label: Lost in the woods, are you?
48004.message: Lost in the woods, are you?

48008.name: luna_5
48008.label: Let the sky tear down...
48008.message: Let the sky tear down the unworthy!

49001.name: dragon_knight_laugh
49001.label: Laugh
49001.message: Tehh, heh he huh heh heh huh.

49003.name: dragon_knight_deny
49003.label: Just what I've been...
49003.message: Just what I've been waiting for.

49004.name: dragon_knight_1
49004.label: You fought and died with honor.
49004.message: You fought and died with honor.

49006.name: dragon_knight_3
49006.label: Live by the sword...
49006.message: Live by the sword, die by the dragon.

49008.name: dragon_knight_5
49008.label: Face the knight, face the dragon.
49008.message: Face the knight, face the dragon.

49009.name: dragon_knight_6
49009.label: Never make a deal with a dragon...
49009.message: Never make a deal with a dragon, unless you're prepared to keep your end of it.

50001.name: dazzle_laugh
50001.label: Laugh
50001.message: Ha ha har ha ha ha!

50009.name: dazzle_6
50009.label: If killing you is wrong...
50009.message: If killing you is wrong, I don't want to be right.

51001.name: rattletrap_laugh
51001.label: Laugh
51001.message: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!

51007.name: rattletrap_4
51007.label: Bleep bloop, I am a robot...
51007.message: Bleep bloop, I am a robot. Eh, just kidding.

51009.name: rattletrap_6
51009.label: Hard on the outside...
51009.message: Hard on the outside, but with a soft delicious center.

52001.name: leshrac_laugh
52001.label: Laugh
52001.message: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

52006.name: leshrac_3
52006.label: ...in service to imbalance.
52006.message: Ah, all in service to imbalance.

52008.name: leshrac_5
52008.label: A thousand of your kind...
52008.message: A thousand of your kind have fallen before me.

52009.name: leshrac_6
52009.label: Ah ha ha! A world out of balance!
52009.message: Ah ha ha! A world out of balance!

53001.name: furion_laugh
53001.label: Laugh
53001.message: Ma ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

53005.name: furion_2
53005.label: I'll tear you limb from limb.
53005.message: I'll tear you limb from limb.

53008.name: furion_5
53008.label: New life will make its home...
53008.message: New life will make its home amongst your bones.

53009.name: furion_6
53009.label: Ah, the sun in my leaves.
53009.message: Ah, the sun in my leaves.

54007.name: life_stealer_4
54007.label: You feel the red hand...
54007.message: You feel the red hand of death.

55001.name: dark_seer_laugh

55001.message: Heheh yeheheh hey heehhhe yehhey yehe heheh eheh yeh.

55003.name: dark_seer_deny
55003.label: Didn't see that coming, did you?
55003.message: Hh, didn't see that coming, did you?

55004.name: dark_seer_1
55004.label: Your life, much like your head...
55004.message: Your life, much like your head, lacked a point.

55008.name: dark_seer_5
55008.label: We are not so different...
55008.message: We are not so different, my enemies and I. Except my brain is much larger.

55009.name: dark_seer_6
55009.label: You're no peer of the seer.
55009.message: You're no peer of the seer.

56004.name: clinkz_1
56004.label: I'll burn your body to ashes.
56004.message: I'll burn your body to ashes.

56008.name: clinkz_5
56008.label: Fire grows hungrier...
56008.message: Fire grows hungrier the more it's fed.

57006.name: omniknight_3
57006.label: Be at peace you wretched fool.
57006.message: Be at peace you wretched fool.

57008.name: omniknight_5
57008.label: The All-knowing One senses...
57008.message: The All-knowing One senses your regret.

58001.name: enchantress_laugh

58001.message: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

58008.name: enchantress_5
58008.label: You know what I love?...
58008.message: You know what I love? Everything!

59002.name: huskar_thank
59002.label: Ahh, this will please the gods.
59002.message: Ahh, this will please the gods.

59008.name: huskar_5
59008.label: You gave all you could give...
59008.message: You gave all you could give but it was not enough.

60001.name: night_stalker_laugh
60001.label: Laugh
60001.message: Heh heh heh hah heh hehhhh.

60008.name: night_stalker_5

60008.message: I'm the beast of bedtime tales.

61003.message: I need this like I need another pair of legs.

61005.name: broodmother_2

61005.message: You're not afraid of spiders, are you?

62001.name: bounty_hunter_laugh

62001.message: Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

62002.name: bounty_hunter_thank

62003.name: bounty_hunter_deny
62003.label: How many do I have to kill?
62003.message: How many of you do I have to kill?

62008.name: bounty_hunter_5

62008.message: You can run but you can't hide.

63003.name: weaver_deny

63003.message: You thought you had me, didn't you?

63005.name: weaver_2

63005.message: There's a snag in your plans.

63009.name: weaver_6
63009.label: Shuttle and loom...
63009.message: Shuttle and loom, I weave your doom.

64001.name: jakiro_laugh
64001.label: Laugh
64001.message: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

65002.name: batrider_thank
65002.label: That's what I'm talking about.

65006.name: batrider_3
65006.label: Sappin' your will to live!
65006.message: I'm sappin your will to live!

65008.name: batrider_5
65008.label: Into the sunset!
65008.message: Aw yeah, off we ride into the sunset.

65009.name: batrider_6

65009.message: A message from on high: You're dead!

67001.name: spectre_laugh
67001.label: [Laugh]
67001.message: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

67009.name: spectre_6

68001.name: ancient_apparition_laugh

68009.name: ancient_apparition_6

68009.message: No shard feelings. Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.

69009.name: doom_bringer_6
69009.label: Mess with Doom...
69009.message: Mess with Doom, you get the horns.

70003.message: A loss so small, the world will hardly notice.

70006.name: ursa_3
70006.label: How is it you heard not my warnings?
70006.message: How is it you heard not my warnings?

71006.message: That did not go as expected.

71008.name: spirit_breaker_5

72005.message: I'm getting too old for this horse shit.

72008.name: gyrocopter_5

72008.message: I belong in the sky, and you belong in the ground.

73008.name: alchemist_5

73008.message: Failure is just another kind of success. The wrong kind.

74002.label: I will commit this to memory.

74009.message: I am a beacon of knowledge blazing out across a black sea of ignorance!

76002.message: I have solid intelligence on what is to come.

76006.label: You let yourself get carried away
76006.message: You let yourself get carried away.

76007.name: obsidian_destroyer_4

76007.message: I am ill disposed towards you.

76009.name: obsidian_destroyer_6

77001.name: lycan_laugh
77001.label: Laugh

77006.message: The wolf is at your door.

77008.name: lycan_5
77008.label: I've taken a Lycan...
77008.message: I've taken a Lycan to you. Ha ha ha ha ha.

78006.name: brewmaster_3

78006.message: What's wrong? Can't hold your liquor?

78008.label: What kind of pub is this?
78008.message: What kind of pub is this?

79001.name: shadow_demon_laugh

79009.name: shadow_demon_6

80005.label: I should know better by now.
80005.message: I should know better by now.

80009.name: lone_druid_6
80009.label: This burden...
80009.message: This burden may be more than I can bear. Heh.

81001.name: chaos_knight_laugh
81001.label: Laugh
81001.message: Oo ho ho ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

81006.label: Where ride the horsemen...
81006.message: Where ride the horsemen death shall follow.

82002.name: meepo_thank
82002.label: Now that's what I'm talking about!
82002.message: Now that's what I'm talking about!

82006.label: This is a real freakin' embarrasment.
82006.message: This is a real freakin' embarrasment.

83006.message: Trees can be ferocious if provoked.

83009.name: treant_6

83009.message: A tree killed you. A tree!

84001.name: ogre_magi_laugh
84001.label: Laugh

84002.name: ogre_magi_thank

84003.name: ogre_magi_deny

84003.message: Ye gods, how'd that happen? What the. Who'd the. How'd that happen?

84005.name: ogre_magi_2
84005.label: Good work!
84005.message: Good work. I thought that was you.

84006.name: ogre_magi_3

84007.name: ogre_magi_4

84008.name: ogre_magi_5

84009.name: ogre_magi_6
84009.label: Oh, skillshot!
84009.message: Oh, skillshot! Not luck at all.

85001.name: undying_laugh

85006.label: Only this.

86001.name: rubick_laugh

86004.label: That perked me up!
86004.message: That perked me up a bit!

89008.name: naga_siren_5

90001.name: keeper_of_the_light_laugh

90004.label: Should have seen that coming!
90004.message: Really now, you should have seen that coming.

90005.message: Get off my lawn...eh, what's a lawn?

90006.label: My horse says nay and so do I.
90006.message: My horse says nay and so do I.

90008.label: Do not fear the light...
90008.message: Do not fear the light - fear me!

92001.name: visage_laugh

92008.name: visage_5
92008.label: I am the unyielding face of death!

92009.name: visage_6

92009.message: In an eternity of watching, I have seen none like it.

94001.name: medusa_laugh
94001.label: Laugh

99008.message: Who's squealing now, eh? Ha, aha ha heh.

99009.name: bristleback_6

99009.message: Oy, oy, oy, save some of that keg for me, will ya, lads?

119006.name: dark_willow_3
119006.label: Don't mind me.
119006.message: Oh-ho. Don't mind me. Just a wee fairy going about her business.

119007.name: dark_willow_4
119007.label: Don't know what I was expecting.
119007.message: I don't know what I was expecting.

119009.name: dark_willow_6
119009.label: Are you ready..?
119009.message: Are you ready to have some fun?

120002.name: pangolier_thank
120002.label: Was that intentional?
120002.message: Was that intentional? It looked intentional.

120003.name: pangolier_deny
120003.label: How it's done.
120003.message: Were you watching? That's how it's done.

120004.name: pangolier_1
120004.label: Try Harder
120004.message: Try a bit harder next time...

120006.name: pangolier_3
120006.label: All your fault?
120006.message: So this whole mess is all your fault?

121001.name: grimstroke_laugh
121001.label: Laugh
121001.message: Huh huh ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haaa!

121003.name: grimstroke_deny
121003.label: You die, yet your failure...
121003.message: You die, yet your failure lives on...

121005.name: grimstroke_2
121005.label: These wretched fools...
121005.message: These wretched fools have no idea...

121007.name: grimstroke_4
121007.label: You've a mind like a child!
121007.message: You've a mind like a child!

121009.name: grimstroke_6
121009.label: ...my masterpiece!
121009.message: Aaah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha, my masterpiece!

123004.name: hoodwink_1
123004.label: Caught ya...
123004.message: Caught ya in your stubbies did we?

123005.name: hoodwink_2
123005.label: Did you fall..?
123005.message: Did you fall outta the nest as a baby?

123006.name: hoodwink_3
123006.label: Starting to feel a bit nutty.
123006.message: Starting to feel a bit nutty.

126001.name: void_spirit_laugh
126001.label: Laugh
126001.message: Hn ha ha ha ha ha.

126002.name: void_spirit_thank
126002.label: This pleases me to no end.
126002.message: This pleases me to no end.

126006.name: void_spirit_3
126006.label: Such a limited imagination...
126006.message: Such a limited imagination you have.

126008.name: void_spirit_5
126008.label: How can you carry hope...?
126008.message: How can you carry hope in the face of the void?

126009.name: void_spirit_6
126009.label: I must admit...
126009.message: I must admit to enjoying that.

128004.name: snapfire_1
128004.label: Who wants cookies? Well too bad!
128004.message: Who wants cookies? Well too bad!

128007.name: snapfire_4
128007.label: I won't eat you, dear. But Mortimer might.
128007.message: I won't eat you, dear. But Mortimer might.

128008.name: snapfire_5
128008.label: You lookin' for cookin' tips..?
128008.message: You lookin' for cookin' tips, violence, or both?

128009.name: snapfire_6
128009.label: Yee haw...
128009.message: Yee haw! Job's done before ya know it!

129001.name: mars_laugh
129001.label: Laugh
129001.message: Huh huh ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haaa!

129002.name: mars_thank
129002.label: My thanks will come later...
129002.message: My thanks will come later, when you least expect it!

129004.name: mars_1
129004.label: ...How foolish you looked.
129004.message: I'll always remember how foolish you looked.

129005.name: mars_2
129005.label: The only one surprised...
129005.message: The only one surprised by this is you.

135001.name: dawnbreaker_laugh
135001.label: Ha ha ha ha ha!
135001.message: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

135002.name: dawnbreaker_thank
135002.label: Thank you...
135002.message: Thank you, you precious weak thing.

135003.name: dawnbreaker_deny
135003.label: That's a strange manner...
135003.message: That's a strange manner of conduct.

135004.name: dawnbreaker_1
135004.label: The lesson for you...
135004.message: The lesson for you is never try.

135005.name: dawnbreaker_2
135005.label: Can you not..?
135005.message: Can you not make yourself better?

135006.name: dawnbreaker_3
135006.label: Even at a fraction...
135006.message: Even at a fraction of my best, I outshine you immeasurably.

135007.name: dawnbreaker_4
135007.label: There are rules...
135007.message: There are rules about that kind of thing where I come from.

135008.name: dawnbreaker_5
135008.label: For how short...
135008.message: For how short your lives are, you've done quite well.

135009.name: dawnbreaker_6
135009.label: I don't need praise...
135009.message: I don't need praise from you.
